## Dataset 

We used CEDAR genotype and transcriptome dataset from [E-MTAB-6666](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/arrayexpress/experiments/E-MTAB-6666/) and [E-MTAB-6667](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/arrayexpress/experiments/E-MTAB-6667/)

| Cell Type | Sample Size | Gene number | Probe number |
| --------- | ----------- | ----------- | ------------ |
| B cell    | 279         | 15774       | 16866        |
| CD14      | 303         | 16897       | 17915        |
| CD15      | 285         | 16374       | 17506        |
| T cell    | 274         | 13905       | 14968        |
| Thymocyte | 290         | 16646       | 17615        |
| Platelet  | 240         | 8388        | 9027         |
